title: Person of Interest Reaction Season 1 Episode 19 "Flesh and Blood" 1x19 REACTION!!!
author: Geeked Out Nation
comment: The beauty of PoI is so much seems unfinished or unsatisfying at first but they do a damn good job of setup for future payoffs

To put your mind at rest about the explosions. This is for the US.

The 687 explosion incidents recorded in BATS (bomb arson tracking system) during 2017 were a slight decrease of 2 percent from 2016. Bombings also decreased, from 439 reported incidents in 2016 to 335 incidents in 2017.   The number of cars that exploded 2016 were 355.  In 2017 it was 199.  They mostly only make local news if someone dies.  A lot have to die for it to make national news.

Thanks to the reunion with Simmons, he called his men back so Elias had fewer men. 


This is one of my favorite episodes. It solves the earliest arc of this series. It gives Carter her first victory. And about the dirty cop saying that about Fusco to Carter. He could be planting a doubt. And it was great to see Carter and Fusco working together.
The takeaway isn't that Elias killed his dad with a bomb; he killed his dad with a cellphone.
This was a really good episode imo..most of these characters get future parts in the show later on
